rules_text:
{R}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Whipfang deals X damage to any target, where X is the sacrificed creature’s power. If the sacrificed creature was colorless, put a +1/+1 counter on Whipfang.
Undercover [i](You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. When it dies while face down, exile it face down without revealing it and put a cover counter on it. Players may look at and cast face down cards they own exiled with cover counters.)[/i]
notes: +frog type, each opponent —> any target, Added some text to make it a colorless payoff as well
